page.title: 16Manager:Rowntree Mackintosh
page.content: Five people report to me.Two are i/c production departments,one has responsibility for services-Fire Brigade,Work Study and Planning,Stores and Box Mill. There is the Factory Personnel Dept. and the Maintenance Manager. {How often do you go around the {factory? I spend 3 hours per week walking the factory,just stopping and talking. {Do you live locally? Yes,on Monk Stray in Elmfield Terrace. I get to work by car,but often walk home at lunch time. {Do you use the computer much? Our planning systems are on the computer.Stores are monitored and recorded on datafiles.The Main Frame links links into Micro-computers in all main areas. continued on page 17
